Title: Scenes from a Mall
Actors: Bette Midler, Woody Allen, Bill Irwin, Daren Firestone
Plot: On their 16. anniversary, during a shopping stroll, the lawyer Nick Fifer confesses his wife Deborah some affairs. She goes wild and insists on a divorce. After they agreed to the dividing up of their belongings, Deborah confesses having an affair, too. Now he gets very upset and wants the divorce for his part, but the last word is not spoken yet.
